starts.title: Both players stretch as high as they can
starts.extra: ... while jumping as high as they can

starts.title: The larger player will try to pick up the smaller
starts.extra: ... and carry them around the room

examples.title: Both players roll shoulders and take 10 deep breaths together
Both players march in place for 15 seconds
examples.extra: Pump knees higher for the last 5 seconds

examples.title: Both players do 5 slow squats side‑by‑side
examples.extra: Hold the last squat for a 3‑count

examples.title: Both players high‑knees in place for 10 seconds
examples.extra: Clap both hands together on every third knee

examples.title: Current player leads 10 arm circles while the other mirrors
Both players hold a chair pose (no chair) and reach to hold hands
examples.extra: Maintain for a slow count of 10

examples.title: Both players lunge‑walk 6 steps toward each other
examples.extra: Hold a low lunge and smile for 3 seconds

examples.title: Both players hold a 15‑second wall‑sit side‑by‑side
Both players plank face‑to‑face for 10 seconds
Both players do 10 jumping jacks together
Both players do 8 slow toe‑touches together
examples.extra: Hold the last stretch for 5 seconds

examples.title: Current player balances on one foot while the other spots
Both players alternate side‑lunges for 20 seconds
Both players do 5 push‑ups together
examples.extra: High‑five at the top of the last rep

examples.title: Both players bear‑crawl toward each other for 3 steps
Both players squat‑hold and pass a light object back and forth 10 times
Current player holds a plank while the other counts to 20
Both players back‑to‑back sit then stand up together without using hands
Both players hold a side‑plank for 10 seconds
Both players do mountain climbers together for 15 seconds
Current player leads a quick 20‑second dance cardio while the other mirrors
Both players do 10 squat jumps together
examples.extra: Add 5 tiny pulses at the bottom after the last one

examples.title: Current player does 8 assisted lunges while the other offers a steady hand
Both players quick‑step in place for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Finish with a big jump and laugh

examples.title: Both players plank face‑to‑face and tap left then right hands
Simulate a piggyback: back player rests hands on front player's shoulders; both rise to tiptoes 5 times
Both players hold a deep lunge facing each other for 15 seconds
Both players hold a 30‑second wall‑sit while holding hands
examples.extra: Raise one foot for the last 5 seconds (alternate)

examples.title: Both players do a 20‑second steady burpee pace together
Both players plank for 30 seconds while counting together
examples.extra: Finish with a triumphant double high‑five
